Detailed Description

A class holding information about a ring pair in a spherical map.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ringpair::ringpair (  const ringinfo &  info  )  [inline]
 

Initialize the object with the ring described by info. The second ring is left empty.

const ringinfo &  info2
)  [inline]
 

Initialize the object with the rings described by info1 and info2.

Note:
The colatitude of info2 must be minus the colatitude of info1.
